column2:
"
- Hold F.O.B. Storm until replacements arrive

"

"
- Rescue Falcon 1 pilot that was shot down while providing close air support over F.O.B. Storm

"

"
- Repel any enemy attempt to seize the F.O.B.

- Another team will replace you once your shift is finished.
"

"
The base has suffered several attacks in that last 48h.
Because of its strategic position the Takistan Army is making all they can to take it although
column3:
we belive the worse is yet to come.
Their actions make us belive that they have been testing the Base defenses
column4:
and we are to expect a big attack in a near future.

Take note that the F.O.B. Storm is situated in the middle of the desert and far from any other military base
column5:
so radio comms between stations need to be made through the Satellite Radio in the main bunker.

Another problem you may find its the weather
column6: in these last couple of weeks F.O.B. Storm has been suffering from heavy sand storms. Sometimes not much noticeble but
column7: sometimes it can really blind. Just be careful
column8:
the enemy may take advantage from it.

Officer Damek will brief you before he leaves.
"

column2:
"
Bishop-One has at their disposal a Satellite Radio in the main bunker that can be used to:

-Communicate with HQ and other friendly units
-Request Close Air Support/Send Close Air Support to RTB
-Request EVAC (Abort Mission)
"

"

Ported to A3: Kain_Lowsta

Original Concept: _neo_

Voice Acting: Marlboro as Officer Damek
column3:
OLO as Lt. Vilem and _neo_ as CAS pilot

Deadfast for Name Recognition and Multitask and all Tour members for testing and feedback

"
